Descriptions.mappool: 一个每周引进新模组的lazer模组池。
Descriptions.format: 一个不限排名的双败3v3赛事。
Descriptions.schedule: 观看即将到来的，于Twitch上直播的比赛。

Originals.title: 原创曲
Originals.subtitle: 定制歌曲即将揭晓
Originals.description: 随赛程进行将逐步解锁独家的TEST原创曲。才华横溢的曲师们创造的定制曲目将随赛事进入到四分之一决赛，半决赛，决赛及总决赛阶段时一一揭晓。这些使用原创曲目，兼具风格及艺术的谱面为赛事中顶尖的参赛者量身打造。

Footer.description: 一个由 TEDDY, ENTROPY, 和 SORA 主办，不限排名的Osu! lazer比赛。

Metadata.description: Osu史上首届大范围不限排名的lazer比赛。敬请享受全新的osu比赛体验。

Team.heading: 当前队伍
Team.none: 你当前没有加入任何队伍。通过接受待定邀请以加入一个队伍。

Invites.heading: 待定邀请
Invites.none: 你当前尚未收到任何邀请。可以等待他人发送邀请，或自己创建一个队伍。

ExistingTeam.title: 已经在一个队伍里了!
ExistingTeam.message: 看起来您已经在一个队伍里了。若要加入新队伍，请先删除或退出当前的队伍。

FailedInvite.title: {type} 邀请失败！
FailedInvite.message: 抱歉，我们未能 {type} 邀请。试试再试一次有没有用。

CurrentTeam.title: 当前在队伍中!
CurrentTeam.message: 看起来您仍然在队伍里。若要删除账号，请先离开或删除队伍。

FailedAccountDelete.title: 删除账户失败！
FailedAccountDelete.message: 抱歉，看起来我们未能删除您的账户。试试再试一次看看有没有用。

FailedUpdate.title: FAILED TO UPDATE!
FailedUpdate.message: Sorry, we failed to update your osu profile info. Please try again to see if that helps.

Closed.title: 注册已截止！
Closed.message: 直到赛事开始前注册尚处于关闭状态。请在主页倒计时结束后再来查看本页面。

Success.title: 队伍创建完成！
Success.message: 欢迎来到TEST Open，点击下方的按钮来访问你的队伍管理页面并邀请选手。

Restricted.message: Looks like you are restricted on osu. Unfortunately you can not register while restricted. If you believe this is a mistake try signing out and signing back into the site.
Restricted.title: YOU ARE RESTRICTED!

DuplicatePlayer.message: Looks like you are already on a team. Please delete or leave your current team before making a new one.
DuplicatePlayer.title: ALREADY ON A TEAM!

Duplicate.message: Looks like a team with that {type} already exists. Please use a different {type} instead.
Duplicate.title: TEAM {type} ALREADY EXISTS!

Default.message: We were unable to create your team. Looks like an issue on our end. Please try again to see if that helps.
Default.title: FAILED TO CREATE TEAM!

UploadFailed.title: FAILED TO UPLOAD FLAG!
UploadFailed.message: We were unable to upload your flag to our server. Please try again to see if that helps.

Messages.default: 欲访问该页面请先登录。

Messages.verified: 欢迎来到TEST Open Discord服务器！
Messages.default: 请点击下方按钮以访问服务器。

Errors.alreadyVerified: You are already verified. If you think this is a mistake please DM @__entro for further help.
Errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please try again and see if that helps.

Invites.heading: 已发送的邀请
Invites.error: 抱歉，我们未能获取你队伍中的选手信息。
Invites.none: 你当前尚未发出任何邀请。使用上方的邀请选手栏来开始。

DeleteItemFailed.title: FAILED TO {type}!
DeleteItemFailed.message: Sorry, we failed to delete that {type}. Please try again to see if that helps.

InvitedSelf.title: CANNOT INVITE SELF!
InvitedSelf.message: You cannot invite yourself to your own team. If you want to switch teams please delete this team first.

AlreadyInvited.title: PLAYER ALREADY INVITED!
AlreadyInvited.message: Looks like you've already sent that player and invite. Please remove the current invite before trying to reinvite them.

InviteFailed.title: FAILED TO INVITE PLAYER!
InviteFailed.message: Sorry, we failed to invite that player. Please try again to see if that helps.

PlayersOnTeam.title: PLAYERS STILL ON TEAM!
PlayersOnTeam.message: Please remove all players from the team before deleting the team.

DeleteTeamFailed.title: FAILED TO DELETE TEAM!
DeleteTeamFailed.message: Sorry, we failed to delete your team. Please try again to see if that helps.

Errors.missingCode: Sorry, but the sign in couldn't be completed. If unexpected please try again otherwise feel free to navigate back home.
